segments.source_content:
---
id: typescript
title: Using TypeScript
---
import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs'; import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem'; import constants from '@site/core/TabsConstants';
[TypeScript][ts] is a language which extends JavaScript by adding type definitions. New React Native projects target TypeScript by default, but also support JavaScript and Flow.

translations.zh-hant: [TypeScript][ts] 是一種透過添加類型定義來擴展 JavaScript 的語言。新建立的 React Native 專案預設支援 TypeScript，同時也兼容 JavaScript 和 Flow。

segments.source_content: ## Getting Started with TypeScript
New projects created by the [React Native CLI](/docs/environment-setup#creating-a-new-application) or popular templates like [Ignite][ignite] will use TypeScript by default.

translations.zh-hant: 透過 [React Native CLI](/docs/environment-setup#creating-a-new-application) 或熱門模板（如 [Ignite][ignite]）建立的新專案將預設使用 TypeScript。

segments.source_content: TypeScript may also be used with [Expo][expo], which maintains TypeScript templates, or will prompt you to automatically install and configure TypeScript when a `.ts` or `.tsx` file is added to your project.

translations.zh-hant: TypeScript 也可與 [Expo][expo] 搭配使用，後者提供 TypeScript 模板，或在專案中添加 `.ts` 或 `.tsx` 文件時自動提示安裝並配置 TypeScript。

segments.source_content:
```shell
npx create-expo-app --template
```
## Adding TypeScript to an Existing Project

translations.zh-hant: ## 在現有專案中添加 TypeScript

segments.source_content: 1. Add TypeScript, types, and ESLint plugins to your project.

translations.zh-hant: 1. 將 TypeScript、類型定義和 ESLint 插件加入您的專案。

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm install -D @tsconfig/react-native @types/jest @types/react @types/react-test-renderer typescript
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn add --dev @tsconfig/react-native @types/jest @types/react @types/react-test-renderer typescript
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>

:::note
This command adds the latest version of every dependency. The versions may need to be changed to match the existing packages used by your project. You can use a tool like [React Native Upgrade Helper](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/) to see the versions shipped by React Native.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note
此命令會添加所有依賴項的最新版本。可能需要調整版本以匹配專案現有套件。您可以使用 [React Native Upgrade Helper](https://react-native-community.github.io/upgrade-helper/) 等工具查看 React Native 內建的版本。
:::

segments.source_content: 2. Add a TypeScript config file. Create a `tsconfig.json` in the root of your project:

translations.zh-hant: 2. 添加 TypeScript 配置文件。在專案根目錄建立 `tsconfig.json`：

segments.source_content: 3. Rename a JavaScript file to be `*.tsx`

translations.zh-hant: 3. 將 JavaScript 文件重命名為 `*.tsx`

segments.source_content: > You should leave the `./index.js` entrypoint file as it is otherwise you may run into an issue when it comes to bundling a production build.

translations.zh-hant: > 應保留 `./index.js` 入口文件不變，否則可能在打包生產版本時遇到問題。

segments.source_content: 4. Run `yarn tsc` to type-check your new TypeScript files.

translations.zh-hant: 4. 執行 `yarn tsc` 對新的 TypeScript 文件進行類型檢查。

segments.source_content: ## Using JavaScript Instead of TypeScript

translations.zh-hant: ## 使用 JavaScript 替代 TypeScript

segments.source_content: React Native defaults new applications to TypeScript, but JavaScript may still be used. Files with a `.jsx` extension are treated as JavaScript instead of TypeScript, and will not be typechecked. JavaScript modules may still be imported by TypeScript modules, along with the reverse.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 新專案預設使用 TypeScript，但仍可選擇 JavaScript。副檔名為 `.jsx` 的文件會被視為 JavaScript 而非 TypeScript，且不會進行類型檢查。TypeScript 模組仍可導入 JavaScript 模組，反之亦然。

segments.source_content: ## How TypeScript and React Native works

translations.zh-hant: ## TypeScript 與 React Native 的協作原理

segments.source_content: Out of the box, TypeScript sources are transformed by [Babel][babel] during bundling. We recommend that you use the TypeScript compiler only for type checking. This is the default behavior of `tsc` for newly created applications. If you have existing TypeScript code being ported to React Native, there are [one or two caveats][babel-7-caveats] to using Babel instead of TypeScript.

translations.zh-hant: 預設情況下，TypeScript 原始碼會在打包時由 [Babel][babel] 轉換。建議僅將 TypeScript 編譯器用於類型檢查，這是新專案中 `tsc` 的預設行為。若需將現有 TypeScript 程式碼移植到 React Native，使用 Babel 替代 TypeScript 時需注意 [一兩個注意事項][babel-7-caveats]。

segments.source_content: ## What does React Native + TypeScript look like

translations.zh-hant: ## React Native + TypeScript 實例展示

segments.source_content: You can provide an interface for a React Component's [Props](props) and [State](state) via `React.Component<Props, State>` which will provide type-checking and editor auto-completing when working with that component in JSX.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以透過 `React.Component<Props, State>` 為 React 元件的 [Props](props) 和 [State](state) 提供介面，這將在 JSX 中操作該元件時啟用類型檢查和編輯器自動補全功能。

segments.source_content: You can explore the syntax more in the [TypeScript playground][tsplay].

translations.zh-hant: 您可以在 [TypeScript 遊樂場][tsplay] 進一步探索語法。

segments.source_content: ## Where to Find Useful Advice

- [TypeScript Handbook][ts-handbook]
- [React's documentation on TypeScript][react-ts]
- [React + TypeScript Cheatsheets][cheat] has a good overview on how to use React with TypeScript

translations.zh-hant:
- [TypeScript 手冊][ts-handbook]
- [React 官方 TypeScript 文檔][react-ts]
- [React + TypeScript 速查表][cheat] 提供完整的 React 與 TypeScript 整合指南

segments.source_content: ## Using Custom Path Aliases with TypeScript

translations.zh-hant: ## 在 TypeScript 中使用自訂路徑別名

segments.source_content: To use custom path aliases with TypeScript, you need to set the path aliases to work from both Babel and TypeScript. Here's how:

translations.zh-hant: 要讓自訂路徑別名同時兼容 Babel 和 TypeScript，需進行以下配置：

segments.source_content: 1. Edit your `tsconfig.json` to have your [custom path mappings][path-map]. Set anything in the root of `src` to be available with no preceding path reference, and allow any test file to be accessed by using `tests/File.tsx`:

translations.zh-hant: 1. 修改 `tsconfig.json` 設定 [自訂路徑映射][path-map]。將 `src` 根目錄下的內容設為可直接引用，並允許透過 `tests/File.tsx` 格式存取測試文件：

segments.source_content: 2. Add [`babel-plugin-module-resolver`][bpmr] as a development package to your project:

translations.zh-hant: 2. 將 [`babel-plugin-module-resolver`][bpmr] 作為開發依賴加入專案：

segments.source_content:
<Tabs groupId="package-manager" queryString defaultValue={constants.defaultPackageManager} values={constants.packageManagers}>
<TabItem value="npm">

```shell
npm install --save-dev babel-plugin-module-resolver
```

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="yarn">

```shell
yarn add --dev babel-plugin-module-resolver
```

</TabItem>
</Tabs>
3. Finally, configure your `babel.config.js` (note that the syntax for your `babel.config.js` is different from your `tsconfig.json`):

translations.zh-hant: 3. 最後，配置你的 `babel.config.js`（請注意 `babel.config.js` 的語法與 `tsconfig.json` 不同）：

[babel-7-caveats]: https://babeljs.io/docs/en/next/babel-plugin-transform-typescript
[cheat]: https://github.com/typescript-cheatsheets/react-typescript-cheatsheet#reacttypescript-cheatsheets
[ts-handbook]: https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/intro.html
[path-map]: https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/module-resolution.html#path-mapping
[bpmr]: https://github.com/tleunen/babel-plugin-module-resolver
